metadata.title: Compatibility of RL78/G15 with existing products

sections.content:
Question:
Are the pin assignments of RL78/G15 compatible with existing products?
Answer:
RL78/G15 (10-pin, 16-pin) has pin compatibility with RL78/G10 (10-pin, 16-pin). The same functions are assigned to the same pins. 
RL78/G15 (20-pin) is essentially pin compatible with RL78/G12 (20-pin), except for three pins, namely, ANI, TOOLTxD, and TOOLRxD, that are different.
Suitable Products
RL78/G15
